Next: Initializations at startup Up: Supporting new widgets Previous: XFSaveWidget.<WidgetClass>

XFSaveSpecial.<WidgetClass>

To just save additional code for the widget after the widget creation code has been written, the procedure `` XFSaveSpecial.<WidgetClass>'' can be defined. This procedure gets the widget path name, and returns a string that should be saved, containing additional widget creation code.
